> [!IMPORTANT]
> Cloning from this may cause Git LFS errors. To avoid this, use `GIT_LFS_SKIP_SMUDGE=1` when doing your initial clone. See wiki: https://github.com/UPBGE/upbge/wiki/User-notes

UPBGE
=======

UPBGE is the free and open source 3D creation suite. It's a fork of Blender. Development is focused on old Blender Game Engine.

Project Pages
-------------

- [Main Website](http://www.upbge.org)

License
-------

UPBGE as a whole is licensed under the GNU General Public License, Version 3.
Individual files may have a different but compatible license.
